name: Beratement Simulator
description:
Getting yelled at kind of sucks.

Beratement Simulator is a little game about big, inexplicable problems.

Choose how you handle a tense situation. Will you stick around to be yelled at—or go play a different game instead?

CONTENT WARNING:

This game occasionally produces minor shifts in color that may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player discretion is advised.

This game can be a bit much. Please keep in mind that any insult or language used is not targeted at a specific person. If you feel offended by anything said while playing, I apologize, but please don't take it personally. <3

Thanks for playing!  :^)
